body_html: I think support for causal padding should be added to the parent layer in tf.layers. Then it will also be supported in the Keras layer that subclasses it. Please open a PR, if your time allows.
body_text: I think support for causal padding should be added to the parent layer in tf.layers. Then it will also be supported in the Keras layer that subclasses it. Please open a PR, if your time allows.
body: I think support for causal padding should be added to the parent layer in `tf.layers`. Then it will also be supported in the Keras layer that subclasses it. Please open a PR, if your time allows.
